text: The strength and influnce of the Great Necromancer affects the potency of your commandments across your undead empire. A settlement must be linked to another of equal or higher strength if it is to operate at its maximum potential strength.\\n\\nThe colour of the rings around settlements indicate the current strength of Nagash's  power there. A pulsing ring indicates that a settlement is not operating at its maximum potential strength - upgrade the strength of the link in nearby settlements in this case.

The strength of Nagash's power is determined by the strongest link between a province capital and its nearest neighbour. It dictates the level of the commandment that can be applied across this province.||Nagash's threads of power can be viewed by clicking on the dedicated button on the right-hand side of the campaign interface. Links can be strengthened by constructing the Great Necropolis building chain or via alliances.
The Great Necromancer shall return! Show the mortal world that death comes for all!
Geomantic Web - Lizardmen||Necromantic Web - Followers of Nagash
Reinforces the Necromantic Web, indirectly improving commandments
